>
[Reach Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=181) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 79 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 122 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can extend the range of your spells. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that has a range, increase that spell’s range by 30 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, you extend its range to 30 feet.
